title: Solarcom
author: Solarcom
content: Hi,It's Solar team again. We're here to remind you that Solar Communcations services accept crypto as one of payment methods.WHO WE ARESolar Communications is an outstanding platform where only innovative, high-end equipment is capable to become a reliable foundation for the modern IT related business.We provide:Dedicated servers;Cloud hosting;VPS;Object storage S3;Colocation;Dedicated VPN;DDoS protection;CDN.We accept not only the most popular cryptocurrencies, but also unique and less known ones. We invite you to get acquainted with a small part of those coins that seemed to us the most interesting: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Monero, XRP, USDT, Solana, USDC, BNB, Litecoin, Near, Stellar, Tron, Dogecoin, Cardano.FIRST ORDER COUPONWe are happy to gift you a -10% coupon for your first time with us: SERVER10CASHBACKEvery time you order any service, we top up your balance! ‚Ä®You can use your cashback balance to place new purchases or extend existing ones after your payment has been processed. 0.5% of the order's total will be credited to your cashback account. There is no cap on cashback spending - you can use your bonus amount to cover 100% of your order.‚Ä®‚Ä®JOIN OUR PLATFORM NOW: https://solarcom.ch/‚Ä®‚Ä®‚Ä®FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA -- NEW CONTENT WEEKLY!!‚Ä®Twitter: https://twitter.com/SolarComSwiss‚Ä®Facebook: https://facebook.com/SolarCommunications‚Ä®LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/solarcomswiss

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Welcome onboard this platform. It is a good thing to know you are accepting bitcoin as a means of payment for your services rendered. You are on the right platform to do that. As you can see your account is a new bie account and from the content of your post, it is more an advertising write up. Here mostly picture or graphics illustration of your services could make a great impart by attracting more customers to you which will add more value to your organization for accepting bitcoin for payment of Services. If your added Services rendered is satisfactory to customers who patronize you, your reputation here would definitely increase and believe me your incoming orders you can not comprehend. I will suggest you go register a copper member account so you can be able to upload a picture of your organization and Services rendered in an attractive way so as to get good traffic. You can as well contact or pm @yahoo62278 for promoting your services here. He is reliable and trustworthy to deliver as he has worked on many projects with successful results and remarks.

comments.body: Hi BitcoinTalkers!Try our NEW Dedicated plan:16 GB / DDR3-1600E3-1230V3 Intel Xeon 3.3 GHz CPU2 x 1000 GB SATA 34 / 8 HT CoresInternal Adaptec / Intel15TB transfer1Gbps uplinkEnabled DDoS 10 gb/s - 4mppsCoupon: WHT50$123/month (price after coupons/discounts)Order link (https://member.solarcom.ch/en/cart/add/142?bill=6&type=dedicated&name=Gamma SE)

comments.author: fosamede
comments.body: What are our charges for monthly hosting and what is the allowed space/bandwidth? Do you sell domain names?

comments.author: Solarcom
comments.body: Quote from: fosamede on March 12, 2023, 10:54:35 AMWhat are our charges for monthly hosting and what is the allowed space/bandwidth? Do you sell domain names?Hi,You can log into a member's account on the website and adjust the term of the server rent, it's space/bandwidth. The cost of the service will be automatically formed. However, please note that the discount is valid for all services, regardless of duration of the rental period or space.And no, we do not sell domain names.

comments.body: Quote from: Solarcom on March 12, 2023, 10:44:55 AMHi BitcoinTalkers!Try our NEW Dedicated plan:16 GB / DDR3-1600E3-1230V3 Intel Xeon 3.3 GHz CPU2 x 1000 GB SATA 34 / 8 HT CoresInternal Adaptec / Intel15TB transfer1Gbps uplinkEnabled DDoS 10 gb/s - 4mppsCoupon: WHT50$123/month (price after coupons/discounts)Order link (https://member.solarcom.ch/en/cart/add/142?bill=6&type=dedicated&name=Gamma SE)Hi, will the coupon discount work if I purchase an annual plan?

comments.body: Quote from: elisabethkemou on March 13, 2023, 02:32:17 PMQuote from: Solarcom on March 12, 2023, 10:44:55 AMHi BitcoinTalkers!Try our NEW Dedicated plan:16 GB / DDR3-1600E3-1230V3 Intel Xeon 3.3 GHz CPU2 x 1000 GB SATA 34 / 8 HT CoresInternal Adaptec / Intel15TB transfer1Gbps uplinkEnabled DDoS 10 gb/s - 4mppsCoupon: WHT50$123/month (price after coupons/discounts)Order link (https://member.solarcom.ch/en/cart/add/142?bill=6&type=dedicated&name=Gamma SE)Hi, will the coupon discount work if I purchase an annual plan?Hi!The number of activations of the mentioned promo code has been exceeded, unfortunately. Please write us a DM with the service and tariff you wanted to buy and we will prepare a personal discount coupon for you!
